metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6191 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the View Raw Source page in the Web Calendar in SOGo before 3.1.3 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) Description, (2) Location, (3) URL, or (4) Title field.

criterions.comment: sogo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
